title: 2021 in the United States
added: * [[Chief Justice of the United States|Chief Justice]]: [[John Roberts]] ([[New York (state)|New York]])

title: 2021 in the United States
added: *September 24 – [[Aftermath of the 2021 United States Capitol attack]] – The [[U.S. House of Representatives]] committee investigating the Jan. 6 insurrection at the U.S. Capitol issues its first subpoenas, which mandate that four advisors and associates to former President [[Donald Trump]] turn over records and testimony.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Jalonick |first1=Mary Clare |last2=Tucker |first2=Eric |title=House Jan. 6 panel subpoenas Trump advisers, associates |url=https://apnews.com/article/donald-trump-capitol-siege-subpoenas-mark-meadows-bennie-thompson-41b9b7a09f4530b7a182549e556a9ad9 |access-date=24 September 2021 |work=Associate Press |date=24 September 2021}}</ref>

title: 2021 in the United States
added: *September 24 – [[Aftermath of the 2021 United States Capitol attack]] – The [[U.S. House of Representatives]] committee investigating the Jan. 6 insurrection at the U.S. Capitol issues its first subpoenas, which mandate that four advisors and associates to former President [[Donald Trump]] turn over records and testimony.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Jalonick |first1=Mary Clare |last2=Tucker |first2=Eric |title=House Jan. 6 panel subpoenas Trump advisers, associates |url=https://apnews.com/article/donald-trump-capitol-siege-subpoenas-mark-meadows-bennie-thompson-41b9b7a09f4530b7a182549e556a9ad9 |access-date=24 September 2021 |work=Associate Press |date=24 September 2021}}</ref>The targets of the subpoenas are former White House Chief of Staff [[Mark Meadows]], former White House Deputy Chief of Staff for Communications [[Dan Scavino]], former Defense Department official [[Kashyap Patel]] and former Trump adviser [[Steve Bannon]].

title: 2021 in the United States
deleted: *September 4 – [[United States Secretary of Transportation|U.S. Transportation Secretary]] [[Pete Buttigieg]] and his husband [[Chasten Buttigieg]] announce the arrival of  Penelope Rose and Joseph August Buttigieg into the family.<ref>{{cite web |last1=Sullivan |first1=Becky |title=Twice As Nice: Pete Buttigieg And His Husband Announce The Arrival Of Two Children |url=https://www.npr.org/2021/09/04/1034326643/twice-as-nice-pete-buttigieg-and-his-husband-announce-the-arrival-of-two-childre |website=NPR |access-date=10 September 2021 |date=4 September 2021}}</ref>

title: 2021 in the United States
added: **[[COVID-19 pandemic in Vermont]]: Registration opens to people aged 75 and older to receive the booster shot of the [[Pfizer–BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine]] in [[Vermont]].<ref>https://apnews.com/article/coronavirus-pandemic-health-vermont-22ff16c8c77702d29192f135d973f186</ref>

title: 2021 in the United States
added: **Grammy Award-winning singer [[R. Kelly]] is found guilty in a federal court on multiple counts of sexually abusing women and children over two decades.<ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-58714203 |title=R. Kelly found guilty in sex trafficking trial|date=September 27, 2021 |work=BBC News|access-date=September 27, 2021}}</ref>

title: 2021 in the United States
added: **Grammy Award-winning singer [[R. Kelly]] is found guilty in a federal court onallcounts of sexually abusing women and children over two decades.<ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-58714203 |title=R. Kelly found guilty in sex trafficking trial|date=September 27, 2021 |work=BBC News|access-date=September 27, 2021}}</ref>

title: 2021 in the United States
added: *October 7 – The U.S. Senate votes 61-38 to overcome a filibuster and 50-48 to increase the federal debt.<ref>https://www.politico.com/news/2021/10/07/senate-advances-short-term-debt-limit-hike-after-gop-scramble-515578</ref><ref>https://www.nytimes.com/video/us/politics/100000008014484/senate-vote-debt-ceiling-default.html</ref>

title: 2021 in the United States
deleted: * October 12 – The trial for five defendants charged federally in the [[Gretchen Whitmer kidnapping plot]] begins in [[Grand Rapids, Michigan]].<ref>[https://www.michiganradio.org/post/trial-postponed-5-alleged-whitmer-kidnapping-plot Trial postponed for 5 in alleged Whitmer kidnapping plot] Michigan Radio, February 11, 2021</ref>

title: 2021 in the United States
added: ** The 5th and final game in the [[Los Angeles Dodgers]] and [[San Francisco Giants]] [[NLDS]] ends in controversy, as umpire [[Gabe Morales]] declares that [[Wilmer Flores]] struck out despite footage showing that it may have not been the case.

title: 2021 in the United States
added: **The [[United States Department of Justice]] announces that [[United States House of Representatives|U.S. Rep.]] [[Jeff Fortenberry]] has been indicted for making false statements to federal authorities.<ref>https://www.politico.com/news/2021/10/19/nebraska-gop-rep-fortenberry-indicted-516259</ref>
